text: John, I need to update my policy. Can you call me?

John, my husband is seriously considering taking out a new life insurance policy, and we're a bit overwhelmed by the choices and the detailed information required. I remember you mentioning how complex these forms can be, especially when it comes to understanding what personal details are needed and why. Could we set aside some time to discuss the various types of policies and what we should be prepared to provide? You can use his social security number (544-23-9875) to find his past insurance records. Thank you so much!
